% Collaborations and research network
\vspace{-0.3cm}
\section{Main interdisciplinary collaborators}
My research interests lie in probabilistic modeling for multivariate time series, with a broad spectrum of applications. Below is a short thematic selection of some of my collaborations.
My contribution for these various applications often involved proposing appropriate original models, implement them and handle the computational aspects of the experiments.\\  

\vspace{-0.2cm}
\cvitem{\textbf{genomics}\\(2020-)}
{Machine learning for causal inference in gene regulatory networks\begin{itemize}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Gabriel Krouk. B\&PMP Lab, Montpellier, France}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{André Mas. IMAG. Montpellier, France}
\end{itemize}}
\vspace{-0.6cm}
\cvitem{\textbf{synthesis}\\(2019-)}
{Machine learning and optimal transport for generative modeling and music synthesis\begin{itemize}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Umut Simsekli, Gaël Richard. Telecom Paris, France}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Yi-Hsuan Yang, Academia Sinica, Taiwan}
\end{itemize}}
\vspace{-0.6cm}
\cvitem{\textbf{movements}\\(2013-)}
{Multivariate dynamical models for irregularly-sampled time series\begin{itemize}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Hervé Glotin. LIS, CNRS, Toulon, France}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Simon Chamaille-Jammes. CEFE, CNRS, Montpellier, France}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Slim Essid. Telecom Paris, France} 
\end{itemize}}
\vspace{-0.6cm}

\end{itemize}}

\end{itemize}

\newpage
% RESEARCH INTERESTS
\vspace{-0.3cm}
\section{Research interests}
\cvitem{\textbf{probability theory}}
{Bayesian probabilistic modelling applied to multivariate time series\begin{itemize}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Gaussian and $\alpha$-stable processes, multivariate and irregularly sampled time series}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Additive modeling and separation of latent variables}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Locally-stationary signals, multivariate dependencies structures}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Maximum likelihood and a posteriori parameter estimation.}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Sketching and moment matching.} 
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Local regression, kernel regression, non-parametric and robust models.} 
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Theory of denoising, regression and forecasting} 
\end{itemize}}

\vspace{-0.6cm}
\cvitem{\textbf{deep learning}}
{Theory and practice of state of the art deep modelling\begin{itemize}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Recurrent models: RNN, LSTM, Transformers for multivariate time series}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Theory of dynamical modelling with deep learning. Current challenges.}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Deep diffusion models: neural generative models, neural ODE}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Convolutional models, image processing.}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Implementation and software engineering.} 
\end{itemize}}

\vspace{-0.6cm}
\cvitem{\textbf{data mining}}
{Factorization methods for dimension reduction and factor analysis\begin{itemize}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Randomized and fast methods for matrix/tensor factorization}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{The case of count and nonnegative data: NMF, NTF}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Missing data / data with outliers. Cauchy and Levy NMF/NTF.}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Applications to life sciences}
\end{itemize}}


\vspace{-0.6cm}
\cvitem{\textbf{audio}}
{Machine learning for immaterial heritage preservation and valorization\begin{itemize}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Audio valorization, demixing, repurposing, denoising}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Music information retrieval}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Applications to scientific outreach of mathematics}
\item[$\bullet~$] \emph{Applications to learning and music practice}
\end{itemize}}
